description: Single storey  rear extension with patio and glass balustrades. 4 velux flat roof lights, 11 Solar panels, 3 air to air heat pumps on extension roof. New steps down to garden. Arched window and doors to rear elevation. Change all timber casement windows to grey heritage UPVC casement windows other than side elevation 1, creation of habitable space in garage. New timber front door and side windows installed further towards front elevation. New garage door with high level windows. Demolish front boundary wall and rebuild in London Stock brick, new timber sliding vehicle gate, new pedestrian gate and steps, bike store in front garden, timber garden store at rear of side elevation. Remove all beige render and replace with white render, black painted timber features repainted in grey.
decision_conditions:
Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any Order revoking or re-enacting that Order) no part(s) of the roof of the building(s) hereby approved shall be used as a balcony or terrace nor shall any access be formed thereto.
REASON: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining property.
